trans-unit.source: Release notes for Application Insights C++ SDK
trans-unit.target: Release notes for Application Insights C++ SDK

trans-unit.source: Release Notes for Application Insights C++ SDK for Windows
trans-unit.target: Release Notes for Application Insights C++ SDK for Windows

trans-unit.source: The [Application Insights SDK](app-insights-windows-cpp.md) sends telemetry about your live app to [Application Insights](http://azure.microsoft.com/services/application-insights/), where you can analyze its usage and performance.
trans-unit.target: The [Application Insights SDK](app-insights-windows-cpp.md) sends telemetry about your live app to [Application Insights](http://azure.microsoft.com/services/application-insights/), where you can analyze its usage and performance.

trans-unit.source: To install the SDK in your application
trans-unit.target: To install the SDK in your application

trans-unit.source: See [Get started with Application Insights for Windows Phone and Store apps](app-insights-windows-cpp.md).
trans-unit.target: See [Get started with Application Insights for Windows Phone and Store apps](app-insights-windows-cpp.md).

trans-unit.source: To upgrade to the latest SDK
trans-unit.target: To upgrade to the latest SDK

trans-unit.source: In Solution Explorer, right-click your project and choose **Manage NuGet packages**.
trans-unit.target: In Solution Explorer, right-click your project and choose **Manage NuGet packages**.

trans-unit.source: Set the filter to show installed packages.
trans-unit.target: Set the filter to show installed packages.

trans-unit.source: Select the installed Application Insights packages and choose Action: Upgrade.
trans-unit.target: Select the installed Application Insights packages and choose Action: Upgrade.

trans-unit.source: Perform the [setup steps](app-insights-windows-cpp.md), using the new version number.
trans-unit.target: Perform the [setup steps](app-insights-windows-cpp.md), using the new version number.
